headline: Investors may go value hunting in 2026 as AI rally matures
summary: Global investors will actively seek opportunities this year in undervalued pockets of financial markets as growing concerns over an AI bubble push traders to look beyond highly valued technology stocks, according to several analysts.  U.S. stocks were volatile in 2025, plunging to near bear market territory in April following President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs before eventually ​rebounding to record highs.  The upward momentum is expected to continue in 2026, analysts said, though investors may have to get selective about the assets they pick.

content.title: Investors may go value hunting in 2026 as AI rally matures
content.summary: Global investors will actively seek opportunities this year in undervalued pockets of financial markets as growing concerns over an AI bubble push traders to look beyond highly valued technology stocks, according to several analysts.  U.S. stocks were volatile in 2025, plunging to near bear market territory in April following President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs before eventually ​rebounding to record highs.  The upward momentum is expected to continue in 2026, analysts said, though investors may have to get selective about the assets they pick.

headline: Stocks Set to Open Higher as Investors Stay Calm Despite Venezuela Tumult, U.S. Jobs Data Awaited
summary: March S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESH26) are up +0.27%, and March Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQH26) are up +0.64% this morning, pointing to a higher open on Wall Street despite fresh geopolitical tensions following the U.S. military operation that captured Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro.

headline: Does Hut 8’s Expanded Bitcoin-Backed Credit Line with Coinbase Reshape the Bull Case for HUT?
summary: On December 22, 2025, Hut 8 Mining Corp. amended and restated its bitcoin-backed credit agreement with Coinbase Credit, lifting its secured borrowing capacity to up to US$200,000,000 and drawing the additional US$70,000,000 in full for general corporate purposes. This enlarged, bitcoin-collateralized facility, combined with Hut 8’s push into long-term AI and high-performance computing infrastructure arrangements, highlights a shift toward using its digital asset treasury to support a broader...
